channel.title: Was 508 first client to have the graphic change?
channel.description:
did 507, 506, 505, 504, 503 502, 501's not have the graphical update? just wondering
if so, why are 508's so much more popular?

item.title: Was 508 first client to have the graphic change?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I think so. I’m pretty sure 503 was just another random rip, as was 474, and never grew popular because the graphics update came along shortly after that, which is probably 508.

Read full topic
item.source: Was 508 first client to have the graphic change?
